title: Memories for mum
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Immigrants - Australia
abstract: A story of emigrating to Australia and the importance of memory
description: Since emigrating from Malta in the 60's, Tess and her husband have faced many challenges living in Australia and raising their boys. As Tess is now suffering from Alzheimer's disease, her husband and sons pay tribute to a truly great woman. Created as part of 'Memory's Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage' in association with Vic Helath and the Alzheimer's Association.
